author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Dropbox, Nvidia, Alphabet, Facebook, Verizon, Yelp, Symantec, Trade Desk - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Friday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Down 0.8%: Dropbox added about half a million paying customers in the first quarter, helping the data-storage provider increase revenue by 28% in its first financial report as a publicly traded company. —Down 2.4%: The chip Emerging-Market Troubles May Not Be Over Next Metals Investors Had Nowhere to Hide in Volatility Surge
